product_name: Topeak Explorer MTX Tubular Rack with Disc Mounts
long_description: The Explorer is a disc-brake-friendly rear rack that's built to carry larger, heavier loads. MTX QuickTrack(TM) mounting system is compatible with Topeak MTX(TM)-series trunk bags. 6061-T6 aluminum construction with 6061-T6 aluminum bracket, hollow aluminum tubes and stainless-steel hardware makes it strong and lightweight. Integrated top fender offers splash protection. Fits all frames with disc brakes.
short_description: The Explorer is a disc-brake-friendly rear rack that's built to carry larger, heavier loads.
